name: Chrome Dev Tools Setup
tagline: This repository contains the information on how to setup the dev tools in Chrome.
body:
1. Download sources of example as zip file

[https://github.com/EmbeddedTestingWorkshop/Embedded_FixtureFinder](https://github.com/EmbeddedTestingWorkshop/Embedded_FixtureFinder) 

﻿﻿![Step 1](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_1.png)

2. Extract to local folder 

3. Open FixtureFinder.html in Chrome

![Step 3](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_3.png)

4. Open Chrome Dev Tools 

![Step 4](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_4.png)

## Go to Sources Panel

![Step 5](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_5.png)

## Add locally stored files as a folder to the workspace

![Step 6](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_6.png)

## Allow Chrome to access the local folder

![Step 7](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_7.png)

## Select FixtureFinder.html, right click, select "Map to File System Resource" -> Select the FixtureFinder.html file from the folder where you saved the downloaded files

![Step 8](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_8.png)

## Select the FixtureFinder.html file from the folder where you saved the download

![Step 9](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_9.png)

## Restart Dev Tools by clicking “OK”

![Step 10](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_10.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
